channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- nvJPEG2000 Library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- nvJPEG2000 Library

item.title: CVE-2023-31028|2024-04-05T17:46:49.238Z -- nvidia -- nvjpeg2000%20library
item.description: NVIDIA nvJPEG2000 Library for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability where improper input validation might enable an attacker to use a specially crafted input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to a partial denial of service.
